===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=へんせいがん|変成|tr1=hensei|t1=metamorphosis|岩|tr2=gan|t2=rock}}. Unclear if this was coined in Japan using {{cog|zhx}} elements, or if it was borrowed in its entirety from Chinese.
